answer: With Master of Education from Spicer Adventist University, Pune India, Benjamin Panmei, FHEA 1st has 8 mos of experience as a Lecturer and Researcher at Bangkok University in Pathum Thani, Thailand, 4 yrs 1 mo of experience as a Lecturer and researcher at Walailak University in Nakhon Si Thammarat, Thailand, 11 mos of experience as a English Language Instructor at Nakhon Si Thammarat Rajabhat University in Nakhon Si Thammarat, Thailand, 1 yr 11 mos of experience as a English Language Teacher at Maeramat Witthayakhom School in Tak, Thailand, 2 yrs 10 mos of experience as a English Language Teacher at Eden Valley Academy in Tak maesod, Thailand and is proficient in Public Speaking, Research, Curriculum Development, Educational Leadership, Microsoft Excel, Teacher Training, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Office, Teaching English as a Second Language, Leadership.
